// PREFERENCES General Language Theme Light Dark System Default Load Images Only WiFi Always Vibration Feedback More Send Crash, Usage Data Send anonymous data about occurring crashes and usage to improve the app. Contribute to translation The translations aren't final and I'm very thankful for any help. This will open a website. Report Bug Send info about bugs in the app or just suggestions on how to improve it further. What do you want to report? Bug Typo Privacy Policy Translation Other Suggestion
// CREATURES Totebot Haybot Tapebot Farmbot Woc Glowb The Totebot takes 3 hits with the sledgehammer to destroy. They will always spawn during raids. Haybots are most commonly found inside of ruins. They take 5 hits with the sledgehammer or 4 hits with the spudgun to destroy. The blue Tapebot deals 55 damage and the red Tapebot, which can be found in the top floor of the warehouse and will shoot explosives dealing 62 damage. The Farmbot can be found in the autumn forest, burned forest, forest and ruin city. Farmbots are immune to the Sledgehammer and take 58 hits with the Spudgun or 25 with the Spud Shotgun. Wocs can be used to produce Woc milk. If you place 3 corn next to a Woc, milk will appear. You can do this as much as you want. They must be fed at least once per 30 days or they will despawn. The Glowb is a small animal which spawns underwater at night. You can take them out of the water and feed them 15 Cardboard Blocks and they will drop 1 Glow. Health Damage Drops
// CHEST LOOT Damaged Crate Damaged Crate - Crashed Maintenance Ship Damaged Crate - Warehouse Golden Damaged Crate Golden Damaged Crate - Warehouse Ruin Chest Ruin Chest - Crashed Maintenance Ship Ruin Chest - Warehouse
// TUTORIALS Memory Demonstration Input Output How to set up The logic gate is a part used to compare two or more inputs. It enables you to build quite complex and automated contraptions. There are six types of gates you can choose from. You can select them below and simulate their behavior. Memory is a combination of 3 logic gates which are used to store a binary value in them. You can use this to convert a button into a switch or save the position of a crane for example. You will need memory for every bigger logic gate based creation. Place 3 logic gates. Set the first to NOR, the second to OR and the third to NOR. Connect the first to the second gate and the second to the third. After that connect the third to the first. The order is important. The outer logic gates are used to set the memory bit. The middle gate is the output with which you can get the state of the memory bit. The Timer is a part which can be used to delay a signal in a logic circuit. You can also build simple clocks with it. You can see how below. Place a timer, two logic gates and a switch. Set one logic gate to AND, the other one to NOR and set the timer to the interval you need for your creation. I used 500ms. Connect the switch to the AND gate, the AND gate to the timer, the timer no the NOR gate and the NOR gate to the AND gate. Now switch it on. Commands You can use these commands to change the way you play the game. You can enable hidden stuff or spawn things, just be careful. Enter them in the chat ingame to activate. Copied to clipboard Only
// ITEMS Description Crafting Trading Properties Extra Info Weight Durability Friction; Buoyancy Flammable Category None Tool Block Part Interactive Consumable Trader
// DESCRIPTIONS Dropped by damaged crates. Can be obtained by trading with the hideout. Can be found in a Warehouse. This has to be crafted in a Cookbot. This has to be crafted in a Mechanic Station. Can be found at Crashsites. Feed it to Wocs to obtain milk. Get this at the Packing Station. Can always be found in the vicinity of the structures that need power. Receive it by refining farmbot parts. Receive it by drilling stones. They are mostly found in the forest. Receive it by cutting small trees or destroying farmer shacks. Receive it by destroying large clams found in the underwater area. Receive it by looting damaged crates or by pumping it out of the lake at the chemical plant. A bucket will work as well. Receive it by collecting flowers. These are most commonly found in the forest. Receive it by looting damaged crates or killing farmbots. Receive it by collecting it in the autumn forest biome. Receive it by feeding a Glowb 15 cardboard blocks. The Glowb can be found in the underwater area at night time. It's a glowing yellow/green creature. You can pick it up and move it out of the water. It won't suffocate or hurt you. Receive it by hammering down trees in the burned forest. Receive it by collecting the oil bubbles underwater. Receive it by collecting bee hives, which are most commonly of the side of a rock. You can destroy it with a hammer, the bees won't hurt you. Component Kits are dropped by Damaged Crates, Haybots, Tapebots, and Farmbots. They can also be found in Ruin Chests. Damage: 20 Damage: 28 Damage: 64 (16 per fry) Damage: 20
// LOCATIONS Crashed Maintenance Ship A master battery is required to activate the basic Craftbot inside. You can find farming equipment in the area nearby. The yellow box in the cockpit will contain a logbook. Haymaze A maze made out of hay bales. There is nothing special in there. Packing Station The billboard shows you how to use it. You will need a vacuum pump attached to a large chest on your vehicle. Connect a button to the vacuum pump and fill the chest with the item you want to give to the packing station. A bar at the station will tell you how much to put in the plant to receive one crate of the item. 
 
There are two types of packing stations. One takes vegetables and one fruit. 
Take the crates to a hideout. Ruin There are multiple variations of ruins. They usually contain damaged crates and ruin chests. Haybots spawn inside or near ruins as well as piles of hay. Hit them with the sledgehammer or shoot them with the spudgun to reveal a damaged crate. Not every pile of hay has one underneath it. Farmer Shack Farmer Shacks are shacks found next to the roads. You can find soil, seeds and lots of building material in them. The farmers used to live and sell their stuff here. Warehouse This is the most dangerous area in survival mode. You need a warehouse key to get in. You can get the key by killing the big red boss farmbot.

There are two types of warehouses, two and four floor. Both types have a lootroom at the top with 5 epic damaged crates and a chest with items. Therefore its recommended to go to the two floor warehouses.

Tapebots are inside and near the warehouses and will shoot you. It's recommended to have a spudgun before you go in there. The red tapebot in the top floor will shoot explosives. Mechanic Station The mechanic station has a large illuminated wrench on top of it's roof. You have to get a master battery from the bunkhouse rooms next to the mechanic station. After you put it in the designated slot you will activate the crafting console. It's used to craft the Crafting Bot, Dressbot, Cookbot, Refinebot and Resource Collector. Farmers Hideout Bring your fruit / vegetables crates or the hideout dropoff / cage guy to the hideout. You can put the things on top of a pad there and press the button next to it. This will suck in the resources in and you will be able to spend them on your purchase.

You can buy items like the spudgun or rare seeds at the hideout. Autumn Forest This is a great place to find cotton or even caged farmers. Burned Forest Here you can find ember, which is used for crafting. Just hammer the trees and you will receive it. Chemical Plant Don't fall into the pink lake, this is the chemicals. You can use a bucket or pump the get the chemicals out of the lake. Forest A great source for wood and stone. It's recommended to come with a sawblade and a drill to get the most out of it. Ruin City This is a perfect spot for finding damaged crates and component kits. Be careful there are a lot of haybots, even the red farmbots are there. Water Plant The area around the water plant is very flat and there is a lot of water, which makes it a perfect spot for your farm, as it's easy to defend as well. Underwater Here you can find the glue clams, crude oil and the Glowb. This is a small light illuminating, green / yellow colored creature. It will drop glow when you feed it 15 cardboard blocks. Stone Woc A paddock with a woc made out of stone which is surrounded by a bunch of real wocs. You can find it in the middle of the forest. Oil Lake The oil lake can be found in a desert like biome and you can use it to pump oil.

//ITEM DESCRIPTIONS
A fresh Banana. Used for maximum relaxation. Sit down and relax or add it to your vehicle to stay nice and clean on the go. Can be connected to triggers which can activate other interactive parts from the bathtub. Used to power electric parts Can store more batteries and loads batteries in to electric engines and other interactive parts that require batteries when connected Everything you place on the bearing will revolve. Bearings can also be connected to an engine or the driver's seat to be controlled in different ways. Take a lovely nap in this comfy bed to respawn in it after your mechanic has been knocked out A sweet Blueberry. A nutritious Broccoli. Fill it with water to water your plants. Activates stuff. The button activates as long as it remains pressed. Bring this guy to a trader in a hideout. Shoot or hit capsule to release a very angry bot. Paint bots in different colors, so they turn on each other instead of coming after you. Shoot or hit capsule to release a friendly glowbug. Shoot or hit capsule to release a very angry bot. Paint bots in different colors, so they turn on each other instead of coming after you. Shoot or hit capsule to release a very angry bot. Paint bots in different colors, so they turn on each other instead of coming after you. Shoot or hit capsule to release a very angry bot. Paint bots in different colors, so they turn on each other instead of coming after you. Shoot or hit capsule to release a very angry bot. Paint bots in different colors, so they turn on each other instead of coming after you. Shoot or hit capsule to release a friendly woc. A nutritious Carrot. Bucket with chemical waste. A simple chest to store your items. Allows bearings to rotate in sequence. Perfect for building transforming creations. Needs to be connected to bearings. Activated by connecting a trigger or driver's seat to the controller. Cooks delicious food that will fill up your health bar or revive fallen friends. Wocs love to eat corn. The Craftbot will help you craft everything from new blocks to useful interactive parts. A mechanics best friend. Use the Dressbot to make new clothes for your Mechanic. Just add your garment boxes and the right amount of cotton. You can also customise your look by using the blue wardrobe. Use the Drill to mine square rocks for stone and metal. Put it on a bearing that is connected to a engine and drive it in to a square rock. Makes bearings turn left and right. Can be connected to an engine to control the direction of travel. Can also be connected to triggers that can be activated from the saddle. Lvl 5 Driver's Saddle unlocks steering settings by pressing (E) on connected bearings with the Connect Tool. Makes bearings turn left and right. Can be connected to an engine to control the direction of travel. Can also be connected to triggers that can be activated from the seat. Lvl 5 Driver's Seat unlocks steering settings by pressing (E) on connected bearings with the Connect Tool. Powers bearings. An engine with fixed power and adjustable speed. A weak engine with an adjustable speed. Can be connected to a driver's seat or triggers. Upgrade for more connection points and less battery consumption. Makes plants grow faster Place fertilizer and connect it to a vacuum pump with a trigger to shoot fertilizer on to plants Keeps your food fresh Use it in a Dressbot to make new clothes Use it in a Dressbot to make new clothes Use it in a Dressbot to make new clothes Can stores more gas and loads gas in to Gas Engines and other interactive parts that require Gas when connected An engine with fixed speed and adjustable power, ideally suited to powering vehicles. Can be connected to a driver's seat or trigger. Upgrade for more connection points and less gas consumption. Used to power gas engines and thrusters Throw them at night or other dark places to see things better Let there be visibility! Connect to a trigger to turn on and off. Adjustable beam range. Add it to your vehicle or use it as a door bell. Honk at your friends to avoid accidents. Set the pitch and connect it to a trigger to activate it. Great for storing a lot of items. Can also be used with a Vacuum Pump Highly explosive canister that can detonate by strong collisions or by Spud Guns. This canister has a large explosion radius. Build on the lift to create freely movable constructions that won't be fixed to the ground. Can be elevated and lowered as well as lift creations that have flipped over. The Logic Gate is a powerful block that allows you to build basic logical functions. By pressing E on the block, the mechanic can choose between different logic gate types. The logic gate can be connected to other logic gates, triggers, timers and more. Great for making advanced creations. Used to power on large spaceships or stations Connect it to a ammo container with a trigger to shoot Adds shock absorption and provides stability. Great for vehicles to prevent them from easily flipping over. This suspension has a lot of bounce, making it ideal for off-road vehicles. A juicy Orange. Load your Paint Tool and give your creations some color Paint any part or block to personalize your creations or even make beautiful art! Paint using the left mouse button and delete with the right. Press 'Q' to open the color selector. Simply hold down left mouse button and drag if you want to paint larger surfaces. A juicy Pineapple. Extends and contracts! Connect it to a trigger to activate. The piston can also be connected to a controller to make it extend and contract in a sequence. Perfect for creating impressive creations. A mechanics favorite food. Fills up all your meters to the max. A starchy Potato. Can also be used as ammo for spud guns and mountable spud guns. Connect it to a Mountable Spud Gun with a trigger to shoot potato ammo. All hits, all the time. Those beastly bots have hijacked and are now transmitting classic selections from their deeply unusual taste in music. Activate it by interacting with it or by connecting it to a trigger. Emits a tracking signal that can be toggled in the Logbook. A plastic shark mount prop from the survival game Raft. It seems to have some mechanical joints inside. Maybe it can bite? A nutritious Redbeet. Let the Refinebot help you out and refine all your collected logs. Put them in by hand or by placing a Resource Collector with logs next to it. Perfect for collecting and stacking logs. When full, place it next to a refinebot to turn logs in to blocks. Feed your fallen friends to get them back on their feet and back in action Used for avoiding standing. Take a seat and relax or add it to your vehicle so your friends can tag along. Can be connected to triggers which can activate other interactive parts from the saddle. Cut down trees faster with the Saw Blade. Put it on a bearing that is connected to a engine and drive it in to a tree. Used for avoiding standing. Take a seat and relax or add it to your vehicle so your friends can tag along. This Seat is not upgradable. An engine with uneven speed and adjustable power, ideally suited to powering vehicles. Can be connected to a driver's seat or trigger. This Engine is not upgradable. Used for avoiding standing. Take a seat and relax or add it to your vehicle so your friends can tag along. This Seat is not upgradable. Not perfectly round. Used for avoiding standing. Take a seat and relax or add it to your vehicle so your friends can tag along. Can be connected to triggers which can activate other interactive parts from the seat. Place Seeds and connect it to a Vacuum Pump with a trigger to shoot seeds in to soil It detects, it activates! The sensor activates when detecting any kind of surface that comes into its view, and has a reach of ten blocks. It can activate an engine, a thruster, the controller and more. This mighty sledgehammer will let you push loose items around by hitting them. Highly explosive canister that can detonate by strong collisions or by Spud Guns This canister has a small explosion radius. Use them on the ground to place your seeds in Adds shock absorption and provides stability. Great for vehicles to prevent them from easily flipping over. This suspension is small, but has a firmer bounce. Shoots potatoes in a rapid fire. Uses a lot of potato ammo Spud Gun with single potato shot. Shoots sizzling hot fries in a spread. Mechanics love a cold sunshake when thirsty Unlimited toggling on demand. The Switch activates whatever it's connected to, making it indispensible when you want to turn things on and off with a single push. It can activate an engine, a thruster, the controller and more. Enough of these can make things fly. Needs to be connected to a trigger or the driver's seat in order to activate. Upgrade for less gas consumption. The Timer allows you delay the interaction between two interactive parts. For example, between a switch and a controller. It goes great with Logic Gates. Used for avoiding standing. Take a seat and relax or add it to your vehicle so your friends can tag along. Can be connected to triggers which can activate other interactive parts from the toilet. Don't forget to flush! A juicy Tomato. This robot head is broken. But the sound generator inside seems to still be working. Creative mechanics can probably find a way to make music with this. This robot head is broken. But the sound generator inside seems to still be working. Creative mechanics can probably find a way to make music with this. This robot head is broken. But the sound generator inside seems to still be working. Creative mechanics can probably find a way to make music with this. This robot head is broken. But the sound generator inside seems to still be working. Creative mechanics can probably find a way to make music with this. The Vaccum Pump has many uses when connected to a trigger. Suck up water in to a water container. Pick up plants in to a chest. It can even shoot and place items from a chest. Use it with the Vacuum Pump to make items travel through pipes Use it with the Vacuum Pump to make items travel through pipes A vegetarian alternative. Fills up all your meters to the max. Great for watering plants, unfortunately not good for drinking. Bucket with water. Connect it to a Water container with a trigger to water your plants more efficiently Connect it to a Vacuum Pump that is under water to fil the Water Container with water Weld your creations together! Select the Weld Tool and left-click on a loose creation, then left-click on a surface of another creation to weld them together. You can also join touching parts on the lift. Hold the left mouse button on the first part and drag to the part you wish to weld together. Get it by killing the big red Farmbot, it's used to unlock a Warehouse elevator. This is single use only. Growth Time Unfertilized: 21h
Growth Time Fertilized: 10h
Hunger: +15
Thirst: +40 Lvl 1: Connections 1, Speed 2
Lvl 2: Connections 2, Speed 3
Lvl 3: Connections 4, Speed 5
Lvl 4: Connections 8, Speed 7
Lvl 5: Connections 10, Speed 9
